channel.title: Comments on: I survived the first day of ATDP 2011 and all I got…

item.title: By: Susanne Stadler
item.dc:creator: Susanne Stadler
item.description: Dev, I wanted to thank you for a great class. My son Josef really learned a lot and enjoyed it tremendously - he is hooked. I wanted to ask you though if you could send me an email - I have some comments regarding how the unstructured time at the end of class was used. Thank you, Susi Stadler
item.content:encoded: Dev, I wanted to thank you for a great class. My son Josef really learned a lot and enjoyed it tremendously – he is hooked. I wanted to ask you though if you could send me an email – I have some comments regarding how the unstructured time at the end of class was used. Thank you, Susi Stadler

item.title: By: Dr. Gabelko
item.dc:creator: Dr. Gabelko
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/web/i-survived-the-first-day-of-atdp-2011/#comment-24">Andy Hu</a>.
Wrong context for comments like that, Andy. I'll bet you can think of something more interesting. NHG
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andy Hu.

Wrong context for comments like that, Andy. I’ll bet you can think of something more interesting. NHG

item.title: By: Andy Hu
item.dc:creator: Andy Hu
item.description: Ah... to blow things up, eh? :D

item.title: By: Frank Chao
item.dc:creator: Frank Chao
item.description: I was scared. I guess I was...forever alone. I like your picture by the way, Dev :)
item.content:encoded: I was scared. I guess I was…forever alone. I like your picture by the way, Dev :)

item.title: By: Thomas L
item.dc:creator: Thomas L
item.description:
And when you are unafraid, you can scale mountains.
And when you are bold, check your harness twice.
item.content:encoded:
And when you are unafraid, you can scale mountains.

And when you are bold, check your harness twice.
